text: Tun Mohamed Hashim bin Mohd Ali (born 10 April 1937) is a Malaysian military officer. He was the Chief of Defence Forces from 1987 to 1992 and the Chief of Army from 1985 to 1987. He is the brother of Siti Hasmah Mohamad Ali, who is the wife of former Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad. Category:1937 births Category:Malaysian people
title: Mohamed Hashim Mohd Ali
